data.quote: Life was meant to be lived, and curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
data.author: T. S. Eliot

data.quote: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
data.author: Alexander Graham Bell

data.quote: The soul is stronger than its surroundings.
data.author: William James

data.quote: Never trouble another for what you can do for yourself.
data.author: Thomas Jefferson

data.quote: Courage does not always roar. sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, I will try again tomorrow
data.author: Mary Anne Redmacher
